sources.title: UbuWebFilmVideoAliAkbarSadeghiZalAndSimorgh197
sources.description: Zal and Simorgh - Zal o Simorgh (1977) Synopsis Zal is an albino new-born child. Sam as his father (The King) who has never seen an albino child and he ordered that the new-born be left under the Alborz Mountain. Ali Akbar Sadeghi Tehran, Iran b.1937
